data.description: soap-enhanced perldoc to view remote pods
data.communities: the original perldocs script was discussed on use.perl.org
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will be used in a replacement for the script
    "perldocs", available on CPAN under authors/id/R/RK/RKOBES/. It
    subclasses Pod::Perldoc by adding the capability to look up and view
    remote pod documentation from a suitable remote pod server when that
    documentation isn't available locally. The name "perldocs" was
    sugested on use.perl.org.
